name: Friday Night Funkin' VS Majorariatto
description:
A mod wich replaces sprites, backgrounds and dialogs to be like the members of the Majorariatto Discord server. Additionally, it adds a new custom week, "Ho", wich has Alva Majo vs Alejandro Maciá confronting in an epic rap battle.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Un mod que reemplaza sprites, fondos y diálogos para que sean como los miembros del servidor de Discord de Majorariatto. Adicionalmente, añade una nueva semana custom, "Ho", la cual tiene a Alva Majo contra Alejandro Maciá, peleando en una épica batalla de rap.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks to the collaborative effort of the Alvamajers MOD devteam:
Thealeatoryman (thomasvazquezuwu) (the founder of the project, made some of the background elemments, sprites and other stuff)

Thyplosion @MonkeySoulGame1 (made some sprites, he's very talented)

Firulai (made some sprites and backgrounds)

Radsi889 @perdi889 (helped with some sprites)

Alejo Bottesch (he made the original Alva sprite and also charted the "HO" song)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks to:

Alejandro Maciá (for the awesome track that is "HO", that shit is fire)
